entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
